testcaseName: Adult Patient has received PPSV23 at age 65 but has no history of PCV13.
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient age 65 years with a history of PCV23 vaccine, but has not received the PCV 13 series that no additional dose are recommended. The PCV series is complete.
reasonForChange: Test case updated per the new PCV recommendation (June 2019, ACIP Meeting) for healthy individuals >- 65 years.
